title: [Signed, Sealed, Delivered]
description: Thick lengths of dark blue velvet cover the walls of the spacious wagon.  Gathered tightly, the drapery ripples as it cascades to the floor creating a puddle of rich material.  Crafted from thick oak, a large writing desk dominates the shop.  On one side of the polished top is a vase full of quills while on the other is a small wooden tray of wax.  In the center of the two is a pile of various parchments and paper.  Set back in the room is a small stack of boxes that rest underneath a pair of silk-lined shelves displaying a wide variety of rings.
